title: Irrfan & Kapil Sharma Land In Legal Trouble For Violating Their Apartments

organizations.name: irrfan & kapil sharma land in legal trouble

text: tweet Bollywood actors Irrfan Khan and Kapil Sharma have landed in legal soup for violating their apartment situated in Oshiwaraâ€™s DLH Enclave. The Oshiwara police station will submit a charge sheet against both the actors for reportedly, illegal alterations done to their respective apartments at DLH Enclave in Oshiwara. Irrfan & Kapil Sharma Land In Legal Trouble For Violating Their Apartments Last year, an FIR was lodged against Kapil and Irrfan regarding their illegal alterations. After finding out that large-scale alterations have been performed by the two with the help of their developer, the police are now presenting a charge sheet before the court. Kapil Sharma has previously received the notice from BMC and the Bombay High Court for illegal construction. SHARE
